overview: In EXTREME BRUCE, you’re guided into a closeup muscle worship session with one of the world’s top bodybuilders, Bruce Patterson, in even bigger, near-contest shape than his earlier video NAKED MUSCLE 4, and sporting long hair. He works out heavy in his sweaty jock, then strips down to make you kneel and submit to his 52″ chest, 21″ arms, 30″ legs, big thick dick and meaty butt! This is intense naked posing and working out, with slow, closeup shots of his veiny shredded muscles, his ass, his cock and his incredible chest. Slow lingering shots and slow motion action let you savor every muscle, as he bounces his pecs, does every pose with extra intensity, gets a hard-on and poses while the camera kneels below him. Nearly an hour, including lots of MUSCLE TALK as Bruce tells you why he gets off on his body and orders you to submit to it too!
title: Extreme Muscle
